5. Mayor

Mayor
=====

Linda InmanLinda Inman, Mayor [Email Linda Inman](mailto:linman@pvtx.gov)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

* Length of residency: 5.5 years
* Where were you born and where did you grow up? Born and raised in Sherman, TX
* What is your family like? Single mom of 2 adult young women and 2 teenage boys as well as a grandmother.
* What is your education and work background? BS in Hotel and Restaurant Management from UNT, worked 10 years in the Hotel Industry ranging from Restaurant Manager, Catering Manager, to Hotel Controller. Currently working for Raytheon Co as a financial analyst and have been employed there for 20 years. Have served on the Providence Village Town Council since 2016. Charter Member of 380 Rotary International. I am currently serving as Treasurer for the EDC.
* Why did you choose to serve on the EDC? With the growth of Providence Village steadily increasing, our EDC will be essential in shaping what our economic future looks like. I want to help make the decisions about what direction it goes and to make sure it is done for the good of all of the residents.
* What is your favorite thing about the town? The people. They are the heart of the community. You will never find more caring, compassionate, and giving people as you will in Providence Village.
